name: Fly Penguin, Fly
description: Hurry! You are a penguin who has found himself trapped in a collapsing ice cave. An ordinary penguin would be in trouble since penguins can't fly. But you are no ordinary penguin! Use your trusty propeller pack to dodge obstacles and collect coins as you make your grand escape. Use your coins to purchase power ups and hats so you can escape in style! The cave is collapsing! You've got to hurry! Fly Penguin, Fly!
